Name: Azure - Upload Files to Azure
Description:
Uploads files and folders to an Azure container from a specified location.

**IMPORTANT:** Azure PowerShell must be installed on the tentacle server for this step to work. This can be downloaded from http://bit.ly/AzurePowershellDownload
Author: kemyke

Parameters.Name: storageAccountName
Parameters.Label: Azure Storage Account Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the account that the files and folders will be uploaded to.

Parameters.Name: storageAccountKey
Parameters.Label: Azure Storage Account Key
Parameters.HelpText: The key that is used to log into the account.

Parameters.Name: containerName
Parameters.Label: Azure Container Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the container the files and folder will be uploaded to.

Parameters.Name: localFolder
Parameters.Label: Name of the Parent Folder
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the Parent Folder being uploaded
